Class GeneralApi

      java.util.concurrent.Future<java.lang.String> getChainId()

      Retrieve compile-time constants.
      java.util.concurrent.Future<ch.decent.sdk.model.DynamicGlobalProps> getDynamicGlobalProperties()
      Retrieve the dynamic properties. The returned object contains information that changes every block interval, such as the head block number, the next miner, etc.
      java.util.concurrent.Future<ch.decent.sdk.model.GlobalProperties> getGlobalProperties()
      Retrieve global properties. This object contains all of the properties of the blockchain that are fixed or that change only once per maintenance interval such as the current list of miners, block interval, etc.

    • Method Detail

      • getChainProperties

        public java.util.concurrent.Future<ch.decent.sdk.model.ChainProperties> getChainProperties()

        Retrieve properties associated with the chain.

        Returns:
        chain id and immutable chain parameters

      • getGlobalProperties

        public java.util.concurrent.Future<ch.decent.sdk.model.GlobalProperties> getGlobalProperties()

        Retrieve global properties. This object contains all of the properties of the blockchain that are fixed or that change only once per maintenance interval such as the current list of miners, block interval, etc.

        Returns:
        global property object

      • getConfiguration

        public java.util.concurrent.Future<ch.decent.sdk.model.Config> getConfiguration()

        Retrieve compile-time constants.

        Returns:
        configured constants

      • getChainId

        public java.util.concurrent.Future<java.lang.String> getChainId()

        Get the chain ID.

        Returns:
        the chain ID identifying blockchain network

      • getDynamicGlobalProperties

        public java.util.concurrent.Future<ch.decent.sdk.model.DynamicGlobalProps> getDynamicGlobalProperties()

        Retrieve the dynamic properties. The returned object contains information that changes every block interval, such as the head block number, the next miner, etc.

        Returns:
        dynamic property object

      • getTimeToMaintenance

        public java.util.concurrent.Future<ch.decent.sdk.model.MinerRewardInput> getTimeToMaintenance(org.threeten.bp.LocalDateTime time)

        Get remaining time to next maintenance interval from given time.

        Parameters:
        time - reference time
        Returns:
        remaining time to next maintenance interval along with some additional data
